message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product is truly exceptional and offers unparalleled benefits. Considering its unique features and the value it brings, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, you have the opportunity to acquire this product for $15000. I believe this price reflects not only the product's worth but also provides you with an excellent opportunity to experience its exceptional qualities. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was hoping we could discuss a more competitive price. Considering the product's value, I'm willing to pay up to $12000. I believe this price still reflects the product's worth while being more reasonable for me. What do you think?
